item.title: Craig Wright Reportedly Set To Prove He Is Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto
item.description:
Craig Wright Reportedly Set To Prove He Is Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto

April 5th was Satoshi Nakamoto's birthday. The anonymous founder of bitcoin was born on this day in 1975, according to an online profile, meaning Tuesday would have been his 41st birthday. And yet according to a report in the Financial Times, the mysterious bitcoin creator is planning reveal his identity once and for all.

item.title: Bitcoin: Will It Survive 2016?
item.description:
Bitcoin: Will It Survive 2016?

Dual identity, battle against governments, competition from other cryptocurrencies, scalability among other factors make innovation inevitable if Bitcoin is to survive. In a Vanbex Group report of April 4 2016, Brandon Kostinuk has compared the attempt to describe Bitcoin as a currency or an investment with trying to discern whether light is a particle or a wave.

item.title: Barclays Is Getting Into Bitcoin With Goldman-Backed Circle
item.description:
Barclays Is Getting Into Bitcoin With Goldman-Backed Circle

Barclays has become the first big British bank to form a partnership with a digital currency firm, social payments app Circle, which runs partly on bitcoin's blockchain network and launched in the U.K. on Wednesday. In what Britain's Treasury called a "major milestone" in its push to make the U.K.

item.title: No title
item.description: Barclays partners with bitcoin payments app http://on.ft.com/22bevhJ

item.title: Bitcoin Start-Up Gets an Electronic Money License in Britain
item.description:
Bitcoin Start-Up Gets an Electronic Money License in Britain

The British government has pushed through its first licensing of a virtual currency company, underscoring its desire to make London a hub for the development of financial technology.

item.title: CORNELL CLOSE-UPS | Passionate About Machines, Professor Explains Online Currency Bitcoin
item.description:
CORNELL CLOSE-UPS | Passionate About Machines, Professor Explains Online Currency Bitcoin

Cameron Pollack / Sun Photography Editor Ever since he was introduced to his father's 'adding machine,' Associate Professor Emin Sirer GÃ¼n Sirer, computer science, said he has been fascinated by the inner workings of computing machines and systems. "Every time I teach, there have been certain revelations about basic things that people have seen all their lives about how computers work that they took for granted, and they never really quite understood," Sirer said.

item.title: Bitcasino.io Sets Bitcoin Gambling Industry Growth Milestones
item.description:
Bitcasino.io Sets Bitcoin Gambling Industry Growth Milestones

April 5, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Bitcasino.io, the world's first legally licensed and regulated Bitcoin-only online operator, confirmed today that it has set more industry milestones in the Bitcoin gaming market, when it released its latest growth figures for 2015.

item.title: Court appoints receiver in ongoing case against failed Bitcoin exchange Cryptsy
item.description:
Court appoints receiver in ongoing case against failed Bitcoin exchange Cryptsy

In a positive sign for victims of failed Bitcoin exchange Cryptsy (Project Investors, Inc.) a court has taken possession of the company's assets, appointed a receiver and has suspended all powers of the company's agents, employees, officers, and directors.

item.title: Blocks are a measure of time: Introducing the Bitcoin Blockchain 'B-WAP'
item.description:
Blocks are a measure of time: Introducing the Bitcoin Blockchain 'B-WAP'

Here's one for all you Blockchain Geeks, App Developers and Traders who love novel data-sets & API's. The "block weighted average price", or ' B-WAP', is a new indicator, price discovery mechanism, data-set and API. This is done using BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index (BLX).
